title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving Profitable Growth with Generative AI: From Prompt to Product (ISV316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用生成式AI推动盈利增长：从提示到产品 (ISV316)
abstract: Generative AI is the largest disruption to software company business models since the emergence of SaaS. In this session we'll cover best practices software companies use to take AI-native products from pilot to production, including identifying use cases that drive business value, features that accelerate adoption and pricing strategies that result in profitable growth
abstract_cn: 生成式人工智能是自SaaS出现以来对软件公司商业模式最大的颠覆。在本次会议中，我们将介绍软件公司将AI原生产品从试点推向生产环境所采用的最佳实践，包括识别能够驱动业务价值的用例、加速采用的功能以及实现盈利增长的定价策略
